groups.name: app.security.jwt
groups.description: Configuration properties for JWT security settings

properties.name: app.security.jwt.audience
properties.description: Audience in JWT tokens for API access validation

properties.name: app.security.jwt.client-id
properties.description: Client ID used for extracting client-specific roles from JWT tokens

properties.name: app.security.jwt.validate-audience
properties.description: Whether to validate the audience claim in JWT tokens

properties.name: app.security.jwt.extract-realm-roles
properties.description: Whether to extract realm roles from JWT tokens

properties.name: app.security.jwt.extract-client-roles
properties.description: Whether to extract client roles from JWT tokens
